1.0.name: wordpress/breast-cancer-awareness-ribbon
1.0.description: A small ribbon will be put on in the top right corner of your website with the Breast Cancer Awareness Ribbon and "Help Support the Fight Against Breast Cancer" will be put on in the top right corner of your website, linking to the Breast Cancer Awareness Facebook page (http://www.facebook.com/BreastCancerAwareness).
